document.full_text: almost two-thirds of new yorkers do not want disgraced former new york state governor eliot spitzer to run for mayor of their city in 2013, a new poll found on friday.
document.title: new yorkers prefer spitzer not run for mayor: poll
lines_and_colors: almost two-thirds of new yorkers do not want disgraced former new york state governor eliot spitzer to run for mayor of their city in 2013, a new poll found on friday.
